package.name: x2_sensor_config_7
package.description: The x2_sensor_config_7 package derived from x2_sensor_config_6 (https://bitbucket.org/osrf/subt/wiki/robots) with the addition of LIDAR Lite v3 (http://static.garmin.com/pumac/LIDAR_Lite_v3_Operation_Manual_and_Technical_Specifications.pdf) sensors, used for cliff detection, attached to the front and back.
package.author: Arthur Schang
